Welcome to the Helio ICS Documentation.
The Helio ICS (Instrument Capability Service) does .....
Look at the installation page (on the left menu) to install the ICS to your servlet container such as tomcat.
Once installed all the documentation, query, updating web application pages will be located on your site. After installation you will need to continue with the Configuration page to set particular properties up for your ICS and to configure it with your database.
